# Erc1155Enumerable.owned() method

Get all NFTs owned by a specific wallet

## Example

```javascript
// Address of the wallet to get the NFTs of
const address = "{{wallet_address}}";
const nfts = await contract.edition.query.owned(address);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
owned(walletAddress?: AddressOrEns): Promise<NFT[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                                  | Description  |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| walletAddress | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[NFT](./sdk.nft.md)\[\]&gt;

The NFT metadata for all NFTs in the contract.

## Remarks

Get all the data associated with the NFTs owned by a specific wallet.
